mapper.select: SELECT a.bookingSeq ,a.bkCheckIn ,a.bkCheckOut ,a.bkAdult ,a.bkChild ,a.bkTotalPrice ,a.member_seq as memberSeqF ,b.memberName ,b.memberID ,c.roomName ,c.roomTypeCD ,c.roomPrice ,c.roomRegDate FROM hotelbooking a LEFT JOIN member b ON a.bookingSeq = b.memberSeq LEFT join roomdetail c ON a.bookingSeq = c.roomSeq WHERE a.member_seq = #{memberSeqF}

SELECT a.member_seq as memberSeqF ,b.memberName ,b.memberPhone ,b.birthday ,b.codeNumber ,b.addrDetail ,b.roadName FROM hotelbooking a LEFT JOIN member b ON a.bookingSeq = b.memberSeq LEFT join roomdetail c ON a.bookingSeq = c.roomSeq WHERE a.member_seq = #{memberSeqF}

SELECT a.member_seq as memberSeqF ,c.roomName ,c.roomPrice ,c.roomTotalRating FROM wishlist a LEFT JOIN member b on a.wishSeq = b.memberSeq LEFT JOIN roomDetail c on a.wishSeq = c.roomSeq WHERE member_seq = #{memberSeqF};

SELECT a.memberSeq ,a.memberName ,a.birthday ,a.memberPhone ,b.member_seq as memberSeqF ,b.bkCheckin ,b.bkCheckout ,b.bkAdult ,b.bkChild ,b.bkTotalPrice ,b.payType ,b.cardNumber ,b.cardDate ,b.cardYear ,b.cardCcv ,c.roomName ,c.roomTypeCD ,c.roomPrice ,c.singleRoomPrice ,c.doubleRoomPrice ,c.twinRoomPrice ,c.roomSeq ,b.roomDetail_roomSeq as roomSeqF FROM member a LEFT JOIN hotelbooking b on b.member_seq = a.memberSeq LEFT JOIN roomdetail c on b.roomDetail_roomSeq = c.roomSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.memberSeq = #{memberSeqF}
